description:
A raccoon comes to a woodcutter`s house and learns to work a spinning wheel.  On a moonlit night, a giant snake appears with two moons in tow and swallows a hunter. His daughters find out and swear revenge.  A lord issues an order that anybody who turns 60 must be left in the mountains to die.  A son tearfully takes his mom up to the mountains but can`t bear to it. He hides her beneath the floor.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tanuki no Itoguruma / Futatsu no Tsuki / Ubasute Yama
The Raccoon`s Spinning Wheel / The Two Moons / Ubasute Mountain
たぬきの糸車 / 二つの月 / 姥捨て山
